name: Zet D
text: Had some pretty good deals most of what I looked for in toddlers sizes were limited!  UT got some good deals on sale no doubt 🙌

name: Julia Robinson
text: Customer service by D. ASH was EXCELLENT!

name: Antonette Hackett
text: Nice shoes! I love to get my kiddos shoes from here!

name: big Boss
text: They have some great prices

name: Dan Rey
text: Horrible customer service!

name: Erica Estes
text:
Lit
Kitty

name: Timothy Sagely
text: I had a set of wheels spoked today at Spinning Spoke Cycles and was very satisfied with the service and very nice ppl, I will be back to do more business with those guys. Great Service. I'll show more when finished.  God is Great.

name: Julie Pitts
text: Really friendly staff! Great stock of high end bikes. We were looking for something specific they did not carry but they still went above and beyond to help us get the information we needed. Really good people!

name: Chuck Creamer
text: Nice bike shop.  Very helpful.  Did not know this was there until I found them online. Worth seeing

name: Jason Holt
text:
Fantastic local professional bike shop!
Very much appreciate the customer service and willingness to make sure we had a great bike purchase experience.  Thank you guys very much!  The bikes are awesome!

name: Eric Manduca
text: STAFF WAS VERY HELPFUL AND KNOWLEDGEABLE WILL DEF BE BACK AGAIN.

name: Amy Crews
text: I have purchased two Trek bikes from Spinning Spoke. Every time I go in the store for something the employees are attentive and knowledgeable and really care that I have the best experience with my bikes. Highly recommend!

name: Tyler Smith
text: The staff is knowledgeable, kind, and eager to assist, all while not applying undue pressure. The store carries a good inventory of quality bikes and accessories. And they offer great advice for maintaining your bike, which is quite helpful for the novice cyclist like myself.

name: Michael Schneider
text: Great shop and employees.  Work is done right the first time.  Overall a great experience and will be back again.

name: Joey Holt
text: The entire staff was very knowledgeable about all of their products. They really seemed to value me as a customer.

name: Ehrrensmommy
text: I have nothing but positive words about this business and it’s staff.  The best experience my husband and I could have had!!  From the moment we walked in the door the atmosphere and customer service was amazing!!  We worked with Jeffery and Max I think was his name!!  I felt so comfortable and was giving so much helpful information.  We were not rushed, pushed or up sold!!  We live like an hour away and will drive here anytime we need servicing or need anything related to our new bikes!!  Thank you!!!

name: Todd Perry
text: These guys put a BB and crank on my bike while I waited. I was out of there in 45 min. It might have been a slow Monday afternoon for them and I was lucky they had the parts in stock but same day service on a bike repair these days is unheard of.

name: Michael Cottrell
text: These guys are great!  I bought a 2021 Trek Checkpoint from them.  I’m from Georgia and was met in Birmingham with the bike.  Amazing customer service!  Also, I needed a shorter seat post and they hooked me up with one too.  I would highly recommend this bike shop!!

name: Angela Lawler
text: Bryce is awesome! Great customer service. Highly recommend!

name: Pam Butler
text: Very helpful and friendly staff, always make me feel appreciated.

name: Tabitha Ray
text: I was very pleased with my experience at The Spinning Spoke. If you are looking for an excellent customer service experience, this is the place to go.

name: Kristy Blackburn
text: Helpful and friendly!  Great selection of bikes and accessories.

name: Matt Williams
text: Got my first road bike here recently. They helped me alot during the process! I'll definitely be shopping here more in the future.

name: Teresa Sesler
text: The folks at Spinning Spoke are top shelf! Very knowledgeable and friendly staff! My wife and I have been a customer of theirs every since they started in the Bicycle business! The Shoals area is very fortunate to have a “true” bike sales and service outfit!

name: Tony E
text: Nice folks, good selection

name: Lynn Reese
text: Bought a 3 wheel bike for my daughter with downs. They guys at Spinning Spoke were great and let her try it out to make sure that she could ride it. It is red and she loves it!

name: Harrison Womack
text: Super friendly and easy to work with. They hooked me up with a very slick Checkpoint AL 4 that rides very smooth and comfortable for me! If anyone is wanting to get into cycling you've got to go to The Spinning Spoke for all your bicycling needs! 10/10!

name: Tracy Churchwell
text: Staff was very helpful, they helped me pick out the right bike and correct size for my needs. They had a bigger inventory than bike shops anywhere around. Highly recommend any one looking for a bike give these guys your business.

name: Loren McCoy
text: Great shop!  Our family gets all of our bicycles from here.

name: john cicala
text: Everyone here is incredibly helpful, knowledgeable, and wonderful to work with. They enjoy what they do and it really makes a difference.

name: Timothy Helms
text: A great local place for all your bike needs. I had been looking for a hybrid Trek for a months. I walked in the store and found a great deal with friendly service. I highly recorded giving The Spinning Spoke a visit.

name: Eric Meyer
text: Eero was great and very helpful. I'll be back.

name: rhee perry
text:
Bought our daughter a bike here a few years ago, and the service was incredible. Just bought myself a new bike and the purchase couldn’t have been easier.

The family rides make this bike shop a true community bike shop!

name: Clay Thompson
text: Spinning Spoke had the bike in stock and promptly put it together before the end of the day. Great service and selection of bikes.

name: Charles Wickwire
text: I greatly appreciate the experienced mechanics, those talented repair people who keep my bike in fine tune.  They are always willing to take short look to make sure all is well or do the bigger repair.  And, the product selection of bikes and accessories is just what we need.  Good quality products that I can rely on.Bicycling is about safe riding and the the sheer fun of riding.  Everyone at the Spinning Spoke has that same focus and enthusiasm.We have needed a first rate bicycle shop in town and I am very thankful that the Spinning Spoke is here.

name: Mark Holley
text: Great bike shop! Pleasure to do business with!

name: Jon Goggans
text: Great folks.  Braxton is the best.  But they are all super helpful.  Will be back!

name: Brad Black
text: The service is unprecedented! In a time where most businesses treat you like a number it’s so refreshing to be treated like you’re the only customer at The Spinning Spoke! I’ve been riding Trek products since 2015 and have been very pleased with the bikes and the warranty!

name: Ben Bowling
text: They were SUPER helpful and provided fast, quality work.

name: River Mayo
text: Very helpful. Very nice people and a great atmosphere! I would recommend them to anyone!

name: Mike Marks
text: The Spinning Spoke staff was great in completely updating my 30 year old city bike and when I bought a new electric bike that was out of stock they drove to south Alabama to pick one up for me; they are very knowledgeable also. Thanks Mike Marks

name: Bethany Batchelor
text: Been using them for a little over two years now. Always helpful and friendly! Couldn’t ask for better service.

name: The Cool Kiddos
text: Good, honesty company with employees who go above and beyond for good service! They replaced a tube for me and when we had problems again a couple months later, they fixed it, no charge, because it was their mistake that caused it to go flat the second time. We have 5 kids, and 3 bikes from Spinning Spoke. I’m sure it won’t be much longer til we have 2 more from them. I highly recommend them. And we love the kids trade-up program too!!

name: Cale Kress
text: Awesome experience and very helpful and friendly staff!

name: Whitney Moore
text: Guys in the shop where so great to work with that we went back 1 week after buying the first bike to purchase the second one!!

name: Lisa Rickard
text: Blessed to have this wonderful shop in Florence! The staff is always super friendly and very knowledgeable!! They also go above & beyond to promote riding in our community and keep our trails clean & clear!

name: Justin Carter PhD
text: They were very helpful through each step and I am very happy with my purchase.

name: Ashley R. Anderson (Stella's Planet)
text: Extremely knowledgeable staff and great customer service! Also, the trade-in bike plan for kids is a life saver.  It allows us to buy good quality bikes for them, without having to worry about how quickly they outgrow each one. In fact, I would say that program is 99% of what kept us coming back for the first couple of years.  Now... we wouldn't even consider shopping somewhere else for our bikes and bike gear.

name: Paige Sandlin
text: Jeffery was so sweet to Joel by helping him pick out a bike for his birthday, and nifty accessories. He even set everything up for us! He made sure his helmet fit perfectly. That made me feel good knowing that his little noggin will be safe and secure during a ride! We had a wonderful experience, and this Mama will be back to pick out a bike for her birthday!

name: Robert Newsom
text: In store, hands on bike fit is a necessity. Thank you at The Spoke for keeping new inventory coming in!

name: GolfBikeJeep Repeat
text: I purchased a bike from them online. Eero and Timothy ensures the bike was tuned to my specs and personally DELIVERED to me in Birmingham. Absolutely awesome. 10/10.

name: Jeremiah Stillings
text: Very awesome shop. The tech was super knowledgeable all the way back to Schwinn's world tour days. I had a great time there today and will return even if I am not looking for a new bike because the staff is awesome.

name: Sajel Speyrer
text: Easy to work with and was a great help in find the right size bikes for my kids.

name: Ted Roberts
text: Spinning Spoke is a great place to get a ride!  The folks working there are great!  Love my two Townies and plan on getting a ebike as well!

name: Melinda Smith
text: Had a great purchase experience! The staff is super helpful, friendly and supportive. Just got our Trek Verve 2 bikes home and took a short spin to try them out. Loving them already! Would recommend The Spinning Spoke to anyone.

name: Jeff Smith
text: Great service, free test ride on Trek/Bosch electric bike while service was done. Highly recommended. Courteous and reasonably priced.

name: Kyle
text: I bought purchased my Trek road bike from Spinning Spoke about half a year ago and couldn't be happier. The staff was very helpful educating me on which product would be the right fit for my needs and they installed all the lights, clips, etc that I was also purchasing. The prices were fabulous and overall a very friendly/warm atmosphere.

name: Jeff Moon
text: The sales staff was very helpful.

name: Deborah Walker
text: Timothy and his team are the absolute best!  They are extremely knowledgeable, and their service is second to none.  Trek products are dependable, and I love riding both bikes I purchased from The Spinning Spoke.

name: Bradley Mifflin
text: If you are a Trek and Bontrager fan this is the spot. A great local bike shop. We need more places around like them. They do group rides and always have great service. Fun to just go in and chat.

name: allen mcdonald
text: We became stranded on the Natchez Trace Parkway due to flatting issues. We caught a ride to Florence and the spinning spoke had all the equipment we needed to get back to riding. The staff was friendly and was gracious to work us in so we could still make our B&B before dark!  Thanks guys!

name: Angela Purcell
text: The guys at the shop always answer any questions I have and they make every shopping experience great!!!

name: Scott Morris
text: Friendly service. Competent maintenance and repairs.

name: robert johannes
text: Helpful friendly and knowledgeable people thst care sbout their customer. Reliable and very reasonable. Good experience, but should have picked up some other accessories,  can't wait.

name: ANTHONY SOLONE
text: Jeff & Blaze rocked it! Those dudes are the best. Purchased a Roscoe 7 while there and they made my mind settled as I decided on my dream bike.

name: Even Steven
text: Friendly and professional. They know bikes and they know service. I consider them new friends.

name: Brianna Wolfgang
text: The people who helped me through my purchase were very friendly and helped me set up a payment plan that worked well with my budget. The two bikes that were purchased are beautiful and I get many compliments on them.

name: Blake Michael
text: Extremely helpful and really nice people. Can't reccomend them enough. Thanks guys

name: TL Bullington
text: Love these guys! They are absolutely the best!

name: Vanessa Romano (The Jeep Diva)
text: The three staff members that I had the pleasure of dealing with were courteous, knowledgeable, and professional.

name: Danny Mitchell
text:
I have had several bikes serviced at The Spinning Spoke Shoppe, all were serviced very well. The staff is very friendly and helpful. I will be buying my bike and supplies there. I give the shop a
5 star rating.

name: Michael Burgess
text: Always helpful, always professional!

name: Joshua Jackson
text: Great shop with good prices.

name: Lindsay Aycock
text: Very knowledgeable staff & excellent service!

name: Ron Gresham
text: they care about the customer and they are friendly     My  previous  one star review  is incorrect   Which was based on one   Occasion  and  miscommunication

name: Todd Ehlenfeldt
text: Nice clean shop. Replaced my tire & tube while I waited.

name: James Edwards
text: Great staff. Always willing to help solve any problems with my bike that I may have.

name: Jeffrey “jeff” Allen
text: The folks at spinning spokes are awesome and always provide excellent service

name: David Shockey
text: Excellent bike shop with a friendly and knowledgeable staff.

name: Tony Alexander
text: Good people, courteous and know their job

name: Pete Williams
text: Nice selection and good staff service.

name: Brock Armstrong
text: Expensive yet knowledgeable staff and friendly environment.

name: Sunflower Studios
text: Service with a smile!

name: Bradley Dean
text: Best bike shop in Florence. The only place to have your bicycle serviced too.

name: noah haddock
text: They fix bikes GRATE

name: Gina
text:
The Trak Shak is a great local business that has supported the schools and community for over 20 years! AND they’re good at what they do.

I brought my mother in for a fitting after her podiatrist recommended a couple of brands they carry. The young man, Jake, could not have been more patient, knowledgeable and professional. He took great care in assuring a proper fit, and my mother has been very pleased! I came in, myself, a couple of months after that and had a similarly good experience.

In light of the manufacturing and shipping backlogs small businesses are currently experiencing, I found their inventory to be better stocked than expected. Very happy to support this business!

name: margie mayfield
text: Wow this store is unbelievable in customer service and selection! Staff is AMAZING and they have the BEST attitude ever! They are willing to bring out as may shoes as you need for you to find that perfect pair! They attend to you and you only! Love my visit and will be back the next time I’m in the area.

name: Willie Wright
text: They manage that was great just did not have the shoes I was looking for

name: Jon Yongue
text: Called and they had what I needed. Went and it was at the counter. Tried them on and bought them.

name: Marc Peters
text: I went in today to get a new pair of running shoes. Scott was the salesman. He was very personable and very knowledgeable. I tried on several pairs of shoes until I found “the pair”. Excellent shopping experience.

name: jon vancoille
text: Great place to buy running shoes, they will help you find the perfect set for your feet.

name: Janet Parks
text: I had a great experience at the Trak Shak. They really cared about the fit of my shoes and worked with me until we got it right! I appreciated their time and care, and I will definitely be coming back.

name: Rick Rodgers
text: The service & Michael was great!  Came in and they fit me for the right type of shoe for my exercise regimen and made great suggestions on brands to try.  Walked out with a pair from a brand I’ve never considered before and couldn’t be happier!

name: Janice Quick
text: Donna at store on hwy 280 was wonderful she found the perfect pair of shoes for my crazy hard to fit feet.  So good a purchased a 2nd pair in different color.  Thanks Donna you are awesome!

name: Flenardo Taylor
text: Great store. Love my brooks

name: Susan Lehman
text: Michael helped me find the perfect pair of walking shoes.  He was a big help!  Friendly and great customer service.

name: Brandon Vigneulle
text: Great selection of running shoes and a very knowledgeable staff

name: Theresa LoRusso
text: Do yourself a favor and take the time to get a well fitted pair of shoes. Your body will thank you for it

name: Dominic Medici
text: Great and knowledgeable staff. Love my new Brooks!

name: Angee
text: I'd been planning to go there forever. I'm glad I finally took the time to go in. They really know their shoes. I will be back again.

name: Jeff Yates
text: Where is this place so I can give a full review.I must of been in parking lot or something.

name: Tracy Johnson
text: Awesome place and great customer service.

name: Richard Champlin
text: Very, very helpful and knowledgeable staff!

name: Bobbi Radeck
text: They were very friendly and professional!

name: Navneet Godwin
text: Love the help!!

name: Regina Brown
text: Good Customer sevice

name: Gena Casey
text: Expert service!

name: Russell Gilder
text: Super helpful and knowledgeable staff.  As well as a great location.

resp.text: We're glad that our location was convenient for you, our staff was attentive to you, and our store was useful to you, Russell. Please feel free to visit us anytime you need advice. -Paul E., Owner

name: Jackie Clark
text: Everyone  was so helpful. Very knowledgeable  of all products and had recommendations. Took a lot of time with me explaining  the difference  between shoes.

name: George Sides
text:
I’ve recently retired to Orange Beach after a career in law-enforcement in Birmingham.  During my last few years on the job I sadly let my physical fitness go.  So I decided with my new life on the coast, I really needed to get back into shape.  So I came to Running Wild to get some quality running shoes.

I was greeted by Jeannie when I walked in the door.  She asked if she could help me and I asked her if she felt up to the challenge, she said “Sure.”  I explained my situation and goals, and she had me sit down and take off my shoes and socks so she could get my true size and evaluate my feet (for over/under pronation, etc).

She brought me 3 different pairs to try on, and I decided on the New Balance 860v11 which felt fantastic!  She also recommended a pair of socks which would suite me better than ordinary cotton socks which I also bought.

This was a much better experience than I’d ever had in any of the running shoe stores in Birmingham.  I can’t wait to get started training in these shoes.  And when I wear these out, I’ll definitely be coming back to see Jeannie at Running Wild!

resp.text:
George,
Welcome to the Gulf Coast and THANK YOU for shopping with us at Running Wild.  I've already passed along your kind remarks to Jeannie, she will be thrilled that you had such a positive experience.  We all look forward to hearing about your return to fitness!! Sincerely, Paul Epstein, owner.

name: Heather R. Houston
text: Went in for a new pair of running shoes & wasn't set on a specific brand. Abigail was my sales associate & did an outstanding job... i tried on at least 5 different pairs & she was very helpful & patient. I ended up getting the Brooks Glycerin very cushiony with a full toe box. Also stocked up on some nuun hydration tablets & a groovy pair of sunglasses.  Running Wild is a great store & i like supporting local small businesses.

name: Carl Reed
text: I always try to support local and the sales people are friendly and knowledgeable. A week ago, I went into the store looking for some inserts for my hiking boots. While a bit hesitant I bought some RunPro inserts for my boots given the sales person indicated  he thought they were just fine for boots and besides he added you have 30 days to try them and if you don’t like them just bring them back. Easy enough went home and found HikePro inserts on-line so I returned the “still in the box” Run Pros looking to have them credit my MasterCard. The store clerk informed me they only provide  store credit or exchanges on returns. I told her I was not made aware of this policy at the time of purchase to which she replied “sorry”. I decided not to push the matter but really let people know or better yet post a sign at the register letting people know that there are NO REFUNDS on purchased merchandise only store credit or exchanges. Disappointed.

resp.text:
Hi Carl, I apologize for the issue that you had. Somehow there is a misunderstanding with our staff member who assisted you when you returned your insoles. I’ll look up your account and  process the refund to your credit card right away. We appreciate you shopping locally and will always do the “right thing”. Paul@werunwild.com
Paul Epstein

Hello again Carl,
I'm trying to find your account so that I can process a refund to your credit card but I'm not finding anything under your name.  Please send me an email, paul@werunwild.com, or call me at our Pensacola store, 850-324-9222, so that can get this refunded to you.  Again my apologies for the misunderstanding, we've reviewed our return policy with all of our staff again.
Sincerely,
Paul

name: Alyssa Byrd
text: Went in hopes to find a New Pair of shoes, got there at 5:45 and the door was locked. If you close early then update your hours, wasted my time coming over here.

name: Toula Edmonds
text: Justin was so patient with me and very knowledgeable about what I needed for my feet to feel true comfort. I later told him I had to go home and see if work would allow me to wear color shoes and he said no problem, no pressure.  Well I did go back and I was happy that he was there to complete my sale. I would definitely go back, great customer service!!!

name: Andrew Belcher
text: Great staff and product at Running Wild Fairhope. Abigail, Leah and Ann were fantastic!

name: G L
text:
My podiatrist recommended this store since I needed assistance finding  suitable walking shoes. The sales person ( Owner?) at Running Wild measured my feet, observed my gait, and found the right shoes within a few minutes. And the price was in line with the stores that offer no assistance, nor the knowledge to help.
We will buy our walking shoes at Running Wild from now on. It was a very pleasant experience. Thank you!

name: Donna Riley-Lein
text: Caring staff

name: Tiffany Rose
text: Be very careful when you buy from this store.  My husband bought a pair of shoes that were a bit too small for me. We let them know and they placed the order for the correct size and told us it would be the 27th of December.  It is now January 6th and still no shoes. Amazon has them available for next day shipping but they won't let us return them for anything but store credit. Not too satisfied with how my first experience with this store went. I felt they should have made an exception since they were off by two weeks (and counting) on the new pair.

resp.text:
Hi Tiffany,
I sincerely apologize for the experience that you're having with our store.  We immediately offer a refund when we have to order a size/color/style of a specific shoe that we don't have in stock and it takes longer than expected to arrive.  Somehow we did not make that clear to you and I truly apologize for that.  If you reach out directly to me at paul@werunwild.com I will process your refund immediately.  Again I apologize for the miscommunication and inconvenience.
Sincerely,
Paul Epstein

name: David Ray
text: Excellent service!

name: Morgan Lee
text: I have never stepped foot into running wild, but I did call to get information on a pair of shoes. I have two different sized feet, I was born this way. So I simply called to ask if they had Brooks in two different sizes because the company offers this service for people like me. I told the man what I needed, a 6.5 for my right foot and a 7.5 or an 8 for the left if he didn’t mind checking for me. He asked if these were all for the same person, I responded yes, he sort of snickered when asking this, he then put me on what I guess he thought was hold but I could hear another female worker in the back say “you are so funny.” He proceeds to respond with an amused tone as to me having this difference. He picked up the phone and told me what he had, and asked a sort of belittling question... have you always had two different sized feet? “No, one shrunk over night,” is what I was thinking. I told him yes, I was born with a disability, called club foot, I didn’t try to explain I was embarrassed enough as it was and let him go. The insensitivity of these people was extremely hurtful, I didn’t ask for this but I am coping with this from birth. I have never been into running wild but I can tell you that I never will bring my business to people like this.

name: Patrick Hughes
text: Customer service was great! The employees at Running Wild in Fairhope, AL went above and beyond the call of duty to fit me in the best running shoe possible. Thank you so much for the individual attention and helping me get fitted into a great new running shoe! Highly recommend, and I'll have to check out their store in Pensacola, FL the next time I'm that way.

name: Miranda Mckinnon
text: Prices are high, but it is a boutique for runners. The staff were so helpful getting me fitted in the correct shoe and sock for a new runner.

resp.text: Miranda, getting fitted for the correct shoe and sock is crucial for even the most advanced runners. We're glad that our team took the time to assist you. We believe our price point reflects the great products and services we offer the community. You're always welcome back to our store.  -Paul E., Owner

name: Jason Small
text: Fantastic service! I really appreciate the time that they dedicate to helping me find that perfect running shoe.

name: Eric Leo
text: If you are having anytype of foot issues this is the place to go. Missy was very knowledgeable about my condition and what shoes and inserts to purchase. The oofos recovery sandals are a must buy no matter what. Glad my co worker referred me to Running Wild.

name: Arne Hansen
text: Very friendly and informative much Time was given to all our questions.

name: Bert Waller
text: Staff has always been friendly and helpful. Good selection as well.

name: Charles Montgomery
text: Every local retailer should model their business after Running Wild. They care about and support their local running community, and have the nicest employees in the World. Thanks to the shoe suggestions based on my running style, I have now PRd 5k, 10k and half marathon distances.

name: Andy McGee
text: Friendly staff with lots of useful knowledge. My new go-to for athletic shoes.

name: Daniel Holley
text: Friendly, knowledgeable staff with a huge selection of shoes/apparel at a great price

name: Barbara De Zutter
text: Great store and even greater staff

name: Joseph Woods
text: Great staff!

name: Harvey Earls
text: Friendly staff!
